Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Penn in 1982...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1984, off Siro Delcastillo (PIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1984, off William Carolan (PIL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1985, hitting .600 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Ashburn on 8/31/1985...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Syracuse on 9/13/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1985, hitting .583 with 3 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1986, hitting .522 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1986, hitting .429 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Capital City on 8/22/1986...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Longport on 10/1/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1987, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1987, hitting .538 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1988, hitting .560 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/13/1989 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Ashburn on 2/16/1990 to a 4-year deal worth $13,297,000 per year...
Injured on 4/22/1990 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 7 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1991, hitting .440 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1991...
